Subroutine vom_calc_derived

602 : 
603 : !+++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++
604 : !+++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++
605 : !+++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++
606 : !*-----Calculation of derived parameters--------------------------------
607 : 
608 :       subroutine vom_calc_derived ()
609 :       use vegwatmod
610 :       use vegmod
611 :       implicit none
612 : 
613 :       INTEGER :: in, ik, ii
614 :       REAL*8  :: sunr, suns
615 :       REAL*8  :: tamean
616 :       REAL*8  :: dtr
617 : 
618 :       parvec(:) = 2.0804d0 * srad(:)         ! (Out[17]), par in mol/m2 if srad was MJ/m2
619 :       do in = 1, N__
620 :         daylength = 12.d0 - 7.639437d0 * ASIN((0.397949d0              &
621 :      &            * COS(0.172142d0 + 0.017214d0 * dayyear(in))         &
622 :      &            * TAN(0.017453d0 * lat))                             &
623 :      &            / SQRT(0.920818d0 - 0.079182d0                       &
624 :      &            * COS(0.344284d0 + 0.034428d0 * dayyear(in))))  ! (Out[22]), in hours
625 : !       * sets time of sunrise and sunset
626 :         sunr = 12d0 - 0.5d0 * daylength
627 :         suns = 12d0 + 0.5d0 * daylength 
628 :         tamean = (tmax(in) + tmin(in)) / 2.d0
629 :         dtr = tmax(in) - tmin(in)
630 :         vp_ = vpvec(in) * 100.d0             ! vp in Pa
631 : 
632 : !       * Loop through every hour of day, where ik=hour
633 :         do ik = 1, 24
634 :           ii = in * 24 + ik - 24
635 : !         * (derived from 3.52+3.53) (Out[38], accounts for diurnal
636 : !           variation in air temperature
637 :           tair = tamean + dtr * (0.0138d0                              &
638 :      &         * COS(3.513d0 - ((-1.d0 + ik) * Pi) / 3.d0) + 0.0168d0  &
639 :      &         * COS(0.822d0 - ((-1.d0 + ik) * Pi) / 4.d0) + 0.0984d0  &
640 :      &         * COS(0.360d0 - ((-1.d0 + ik) * Pi) / 6.d0) + 0.4632d0  &
641 :      &         * COS(3.805d0 - ((-1.d0 + ik) * Pi) / 12.d0))
642 :           tairh(ii) = tair
643 :           cah(ii) = cavec(in)
644 : !         vd__ = 0.006028127d0 * 2.718282d0 ** ((17.27d0 * tair)       &
645 : !    &       / (237.3d0 + tair)) - 9.869233d-6 * vp_  ! (derived from 3.54+3.55) (Out[52]), accounts for diurnal variation in vapour deficit
646 : 
647 :           vd__ = (((0.6108d0 * E__ ** (17.27d0 * tair / (tair + 237.3d0))) &
648 :      &         * 1000) - vp_) / (press(in) * 100.d0)
649 : 
650 :           if (vd__ .le. 0.d0) vd__ = 0.d0
651 :           vdh(ii) = vd__
652 : !         * average rainfall in hour ii (m/s)
653 :           rainh(ii) = rainvec(in) / (24.d0 * 3600.d0 * 1000.d0)
654 :           if (sunr .le. ik .and. ik + 1 .le. suns) then
655 : !           * ([Out30]), in mol/m2/s (derived from 3.51) accounts for
656 : !             diurnal variation in global irradiance
657 :             parh(ii) = (-0.000873d0 * parvec(in) * COS(0.017453d0 * lat) &
658 :      &               * SQRT(0.920818d0 - 0.079182d0                    &
659 :      &               * COS(0.034428d0 * (10.d0 + dayyear(in))))        &
660 :      &               * COS(0.2618d0 * ik) - 0.000347d0 * parvec(in)    &
661 :      &               * COS(0.017214d0 * (10.d0 + dayyear(in)))         &
662 :      &               * SIN(0.017453d0 * lat)) / (-1.250192d0 * daylength &
663 :      &               * COS(0.017214d0 * (10.d0 + dayyear(in)))         &
664 :      &               * SIN(0.017453d0 * lat) + 24.d0                   &
665 :      &               * COS(0.017453d0 * lat)                           &
666 :      &               * SQRT(0.920818d0 - 0.079182d0                    &
667 :      &               * COS(0.034428d0 * (10.d0 + dayyear(in))))        &
668 :      &               * (1.d0 - (0.158363d0                             &
669 :      &               * COS(0.017214d0 * (10.d0 + dayyear(in))) ** 2.d0 &
670 :      &               * TAN(0.017453d0 * lat) ** 2.d0)                  &
671 :      &               / (0.920818d0 - 0.079182d0 * COS(0.034428d0       &
672 :      &               * (10.d0 + dayyear(in))))) ** 0.5d0)
673 :           else 
674 :             parh(ii) = 0.d0
675 :           endif
676 : 
677 :           write(kfile_hourlyweather,'(5i8,5e11.3)') ik, dayyear(in),   &
678 :      &      day(in), month(in), year(in), tairh(ii), vdh(ii),          &
679 :      &      parh(ii), rainh(ii), cah(ii)
680 : 
681 : !         * (Out[274], derived from (3.25))
682 :           gammastarvec(ii) = 0.00004275d0 * E__ ** ((18915.d0          &
683 :      &                     * (-25.d0 + tairh(ii))) / (149.d0 * R__     &
684 :      &                     * (273.d0 + tairh(ii))))
685 :         enddo
686 :       enddo
687 : 
688 :       return
689 :       end subroutine vom_calc_derived
